common.tooShort: Letters count should not be less than {{min}}
common.tooLow: Must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
common.tooHigh: Must be less than or equal to {{max}}

search.required: The search criteria cannot be empty
search.wildcards: Fuzzy search cannot be at the beginning or middle of the string, or with a wildcard
search.specialChars: These characters ()&[]{}^|<>+=\ are reserved and can't be accepted in the input keywords
search.tooLong: The maximum length for a search criteria is 15 words.
search.invalidAdvanced: Some of the fields you entered are not valid.
